channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: African fintech Moniepoint gets Visa backing, plans to work on contactless payments

item.title: Psychology Can Be Harnessed to Combat Violent Extremism

item.title: WhatsApp wins reprieve in India over sharing user data with Meta

item.title: The Who's Who of MAGA Influencers You Should Know About by Now
item.description: Welcome to Trump 2.0, where these creators have the ears not only of their audiences but of the president as well.

item.title: OpenAI may preview its agent tool for users on the $200 per month Pro plan

item.title: Neko, the body-scanning startup co-founded by Spotify’s Daniel Ek, snaps up $260M at a $1.8B valuation
